name: Johnsonville Brat Hot Tub
author: From the Kitchen at Johnsonville Sausage
summary: Grilled brats get a hot bath in beer with butter and onions for even more juicy and delicious flavor!
ingredients: 1 (2.85 lb) package Johnsonville® Original Bratwurst Party Pack
2 (12 ounce) cans beer, or as needed
1 large yellow or white onion, sliced
directions: Prepare brats on a gas or charcoal grill according to package directions
When brats are cooked, remove from grill and place in foil baking pan
Place pan on grill, add beer, butter and onions
Over medium heat, on a covered grill, allow brats to simmer in beer and onions
Serve each brat with onions on a bun
